entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Port au Choix
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:41 p.m. NDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low zero.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers this evening. A few flurries beginning near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 3. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 7 May 2023
